mi_NZ {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%f%N%a%N%d%N%b%N%s %h %e %r%N%%z %T%N%c%N" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: AmPmMarkers */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryISBNNumber */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryNumber */
    CurrencyElements { 
            "$",
            "NZD ",
            ".",
    }
    Identification { 
        Title { "Maori language locale for New Zealand" }
        Source { "James Gasson" }
        Address { "" }
        Contact { "James Gasson, Pablo Saratxaga" }
        Email { "james.gasson@clear.net.nz, pablo@mandrakesoft.com" }
        Telephone { "" }
        Fax { "" }
        Language { "Maori" }
        Territory { "New Zealand" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "0.3" }
        Date { "2001-01-28" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: LanguageLibraryUse */
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "^[1yY\u0101\u0100\u00E4\u00C4aA].*" }
        NoExpression { "^[0nNkK].*" }
        YesStr { "\u0101e" }
        NoStr { "k\u0101ore" }
    }
    NameFormat { 
        NamePattern { "%d%t%g%t%m%t%f" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "" }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "" }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "" }
        LongSalutationMr { "" }
        LongSalutationMiss { "" }
        LongSalutationMrs { "" }
    }
    NumberElements { 
            ".",
            ",",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
            "\u00A4#,##0.00;-\u00A4#,##0.00",
            "#,##0%",
    }
    TelephoneFormat { 
        InternationalFormat { "+%c %a %l" }
        DomesticFormat { "" }
        InternationalDialCode { "" }
        InternationalPrefix { "64" }
    }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "hh:mm:ss",
                    "Te EEEE, te dd o MMMM, yyyy  z",
                    "Te EEEE, te dd o MMMM, yyyy hh:mm:ss z",
                    "dd/MMMM/yy",
                    "dd/MMMM/yy",
                    "{1} {0}",
            }
            dayNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "Ta",
                            "Ma",
                            "T\u016B",
                            "We",
                            "T\u0101i",
                            "Pa",
                            "H\u0101",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "R\u0101tapu",
                            "Mane",
                            "T\u016Brei",
                            "Wenerei",
                            "T\u0101ite",
                            "Paraire",
                            "H\u0101tarei",
                    }
                }
            }
            monthNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "Kohi",
                            "Hui",
                            "Pou",
                            "Pae",
                            "Hara",
                            "Pipi",
                            "H\u014Dngoi",
                            "Here",
                            "Mahu",
                            "Whi-nu",
                            "Whi-ra",
                            "Haki",
                            "",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "Kohi-t\u0101tea",
                            "Hui-tanguru",
                            "Pout\u016B-te-rangi",
                            "Paenga-wh\u0101wh\u0101",
                            "Haratua",
                            "Pipiri",
                            "H\u014Dngoingoi",
                            "Here-turi-k\u014Dk\u0101",
                            "Mahuru",
                            "Whiringa-\u0101-nuku",
                            "Whiringa-\u0101-rangi",
                            "Hakihea",
                            "",
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
